title: Scaffold UI shell with sidebar + nav
goal: App Router layout with a persistent left sidebar and top header.
details: Create components/Sidebar.tsx and components/Topbar.tsx. Update app/layout.tsx to include the sidebar and top bar. Add nav links to /dashboard, /jobs, /clients, /quotes (active link highlighted). Keep styles minimal using CSS modules or inline styles; do not add new dependencies. Ensure each page has an <h1> matching the route name. Do not modify public/sw.js or any server config.

title: Set home to redirect to dashboard
details: Use next/navigation redirect in app/page.tsx to send users to /dashboard; file must compile on Next 13+/App Router.
